text: Osvaldo Licini (22 March 1894 – 11 October 1958) was an Italian painter, active as an abstract artist. Osvaldo was born in Ascoli Piceno in the Marche. Osvaldo became an abstract artist around 1930 after his encounter with the Parisian Circle et Carré and Abstraction-Création groups.Pinacoteca Brera, collection. In 1986, the Centro Studi Osvaldo Licini was founded in his adopted town of Monte Vidon Corrado where he died in 1958. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1958 deaths Category:20th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:People from Parma Category:Abstract painters
title: Osvaldo Licini
